website_summaries.verdict: This 2-pad system is designed to be put in place under a bed and on a chair at the same time.
pros: A decent price for an alarm with 2 pads
Any movement or changes in pressure will trigger the alarm
Alarm can be set to a musical alert
cons: The alarm is attached to the pad and cannot be taken to another room

customer_reviews.title: The chair pad works very well.
customer_reviews.text: The chair pad works perfectly. I’m very pleased, but not so with the bed pad. The alarm rings every time there is movement.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie D.

customer_reviews.title: Alarm is loud and you can hear it in other rooms which will give you a sense of security.
customer_reviews.text: This item was extremely helpful while caring for my elderly father while on hospice. The alarm is very sensitive and would go off with any slight adjustment he made on the bed. The alarm is very loud which was helpful when we left the room for any reason. The connection when we went from the chair to the bed was not as tight and we realized that sometimes the alarm would go off because of the connection
customer_reviews.author: cyndi  haines

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Unable to get these pads to work properly. I've tried over several weeks to try and optimize placement but the alarm just won't work. New batteries were no help. Also tried using with several people of different weights, but the alarm only works about 1/3 of the time.
customer_reviews.author: craig caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help my MIL to use for my FIL. It was too sensitive. She tried to make it work but just couldn’t. I tried to return it but says the return window has closed. Very disappointed in this product and now I am unable to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product worker perfect. Sadly my mother has tried getting out of the bed without assistance and so we finally decided to try these to alert us and omg boy does it work!! Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Maria#2

customer_reviews.title: Way too sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Way too sensitive went off every time my mom moved and it kept waking her up so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Howard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for caregiving unstable seniors.
customer_reviews.text: Really loud to alert me when my mother decides she can walk on her own. I hear it even when I’m in the basement. I use the chair one when she’s up.
customer_reviews.author: Linda McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Once we purchased this product. Mom hasn't had any falls.
customer_reviews.author: V Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed. It goes off with the slightest movements of the patient. Need one to set alarm when patients leave the sensor pad.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to use, and the alarm is very loud!
customer_reviews.text: This product works as stated. The alarm is loud enough to wake while being in another room. Great product, especially for it's low price.
customer_reviews.author: JoCecelia S.

customer_reviews.title: Alarm works
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for letting us know when our grandmother tried to get up on her own.
customer_reviews.author: bejoyfulalways
